Text: Does my phone need to be rooted?

@xenoFLASH 

Yes
Note : Tested on Sony Xperia Go (Mali400 Gpu, CM9)... Seed Till YouBLEED!...Thanks
Well, that sucks for me.

Thank you very much for this! Took some time to get it to work. 

What i did - 
1. Unzip the downloaded content. 
2. Install the APK
3. Copy data/obb as instructed to android/obb/ (Make a OBB folder if there is non)
4. Install the Modded play store!! Link in the description is the original one ! the one you need is  - http://thepiratebay.sx/torrent/8472729/Google_Play_Store_Modded_by_ChelpuS
5. play and enjoy :) 

YOU NEED ROOT TO INSTALL THE MODDED PLAY STORE! so yes - you need to be rooted to play this:) 

Thank again to the uploader!
